Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Cyan>太陽の正位置<White>…… 今日の私、なかなかの運勢ね……
Entry.EnglishText: ...The <Cyan>Upright Sun<White>... It looks like today is my lucky day...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……えっ、あなたも占ってほしい？ 仕方ないわね……じゃあ、始めましょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: ...What's that? You want me to read your fortune as well? I guess there's no getting around it... Well, shall we begin?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと<Hilda>さん、ダメですよ。 時間ないんですから……
Entry.EnglishText: Wait, <Hilda>, you can't do that. We don't have the time for that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたってほんと、堅苦しいわね。 まあ、そんな事みたいだから、占いはまた今度ね。
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you strict? Very well... Since it looks like we don't have the time, we'll have to save it for another occasion.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの、<Hilda>さん……誰と話してるんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Um, <Hilda>... Who are you talking to?
